tool_description: An api for generating user profile avatars based on the name specified with more customisation
name: 1Avatar
title: 1Avatar

api_list.name: Generate your avatar
api_list.description: Generating user profile avatars based on the name specified with more customization

required_parameters.name: rounded
required_parameters.description: Avatar can be a circle (yes) or a rectangle (no)

required_parameters.name: fullname
required_parameters.description: Fullname of user if there is a space we subtracts first letter of the first word and the last word otherwise we subtracts the first & second letter

required_parameters.name: background
required_parameters.description: Background color of the avatar either a hex code or you can put random to get random color

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: The size of the avatar either 256 or 512
